data.title: Marimbafest Australia
data.meta_description: Marimbafest 2024, the 5th solo marimba and ensemble competition is happening Sun 30th June to Sat 6th July at the Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts.
data.text:
Marimbafest is proud to call the Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts at Edith Cowan University home for all events 2023 and beyond. WAAPA is one of the top music schools in Australia and we gratefully acknowledge the support of the Academy in helping us host this incredible event.

​

2024 Faculty and Staff representing WAAPA:

Tim White (OAM)

​

MORE INFO

Salyers Percussion has been over 10 years in the making. In 2002 Bruce Salyers acquired his first mallet wrapping machine and has been producing world class mallets for over a decade. From DCI and WGI ensembles to concert halls around the globe, the mallets designed by Bruce Salyers have been a staple of performers everywhere. We thank Salyers Percussion for joining the Marimbafest family in 2021.

​

2024 Faculty and Staff Salyers Percussion Artists:

Adam Tan (Concert)

​

MORE INFO

HAOSEN Instruments is both a manufacturer of affordable wholesale percussion instruments for the education sector, as well as a distributor for many major percussion brands. HAOSEN also makes THE TRAVELLER By Adam Tan, a percussion backpack designed by Adam Tan. We thank HAOSEN for joining the Marimbafest family since 2023.

​

2024 Faculty and Staff HAOSEN Artists:

Adam Tan (Designer of THE TRAVELLER By Adam Tan)

​

MORE INFO

Founded by legendary marimba maker Ron Samuels in 1980, Marimba One is one of the leading manufacturers of high-quality handmade rosewood marimbas in the world. Marimba One's marimbas, mallets and vibraphones receive international acclaim for their innovative design, attention to detail and signature sound quality. We thank Marimba One for their support since 2019 and welcome them as the Signature Sponsor for a fourth year in 2024.

​

2024 Faculty and Staff Marimba One Artists:

Adam Tan (Premier), Matthew Lau (Premier), Robert Oetomo (Premier), Pauline Roberts (Discovery), Master Christopher (Educational), Rosie Cerquone (Discovery)

​

MORE INFO

Known for their signature latex technology, every Encore mallet is assembled with an eye toward quality. Experienced percussionists check for uniform mallethead diameter. These are just a few details that work together to provide a solid foundation for percussionists pursuing excellence. We thank Encore Mallets Inc. for their support since 2019.

​

2024 Faculty and Staff Encore Mallets Artists:

Adam Tan (Signature), Kana Omori (Signature), Robert Oetomo (Signature)

​

MORE INFO

Edition Svitzer's high quality of our sheet music aims to nurture the relationship between musician and musical work, providing years of continued pleasure. Founded by Johan and Henrik Svitzer in Copenhagen, Edition Svitzer publishes high quality, hand engraved sheet music that sets the standard for sheet music around the world. We thank Edition Svitzer for their support since 2019.

​

2024 Faculty and Staff Edition Svitzer Artists:

Adam Tan, Kana Omori, Robert Oetomo

​

MORE INFO

Black Swamp Percussion is a leading manufacturer of hand-built percussion accessories and drums. With a long standing foundation in concert, orchestral and session percussion settings, Black Swamp's presence can be found in concert venues and schools worldwide. We thank Black Swamp for their support since 2023.

​

2024 Faculty and Staff Black Swamp Percussion Artists:

Adam Tan (Artist Endorser), Dr Matthew Lau (Artist Endorser), Master Christopher (Concert Artist), Ivan Trevino (Artist Endorser)

​

MORE INFO

Optimum Percussion is the largest retailer of percussion equipment in Australia, with a long-standing history of supplying the schools, institutions and orchestras of Australia and beyond for many years. We thank Optimum for their support since 2019.

MORE INFO
